title: Full-Time Meta/Google Ads Specialist
job_overview:
Are you great at creating paid ads that get results?
Do you know how to manage and scale ad campaigns effectively?

If yes, we want you on our team!

Work Schedule:
9:00 AM to 5:00 PM CST (US Time)
Equivalent to night shift in the Philippines
Fully remote / work from home

What We're Looking For:
1–2+ years of experience managing paid ads
Proven results (please share your portfolio or case studies)
Experience with at least $5,000 in ad spend per month
Ability to build funnels and scale campaigns
Experience with cost control – knowing when to stop or adjust ads
Competitor research – staying updated with trends
Meta Certification (optional)
Other relevant courses or certifications

What We Offer:
100% remote work – work from anywhere
A team focused on growth and results
Competitive pay based on experience
Chance to work on exciting campaigns
